answers.title: Form-based authentication for websites
answers.content: We believe that Stack Overflow should not just be a resource for very specific technical questions, but also for general guidelines on how to solve variations on common problems.Form based authentication for websites should be a fine topic.

answers.title: PART I: How To Log In
answers.content: We'll assume you already know how to build a login+password HTML form which POSTs the values to a script on the server side for authentication. The sections below will deal with patterns for sound practical auth, and how to avoid the most common security pitfalls.
